subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Showing that shrewd management matters, the 2013 baseball playoffs include more teams from the bottom 10 in payrolls (Pirates, Indians, Rays and Athletics) than the top 10.
snippet: Showing that shrewd management matters, the 2013 baseball playoffs include more teams from the bottom 10 in payrolls (Pirates, Indians, Rays and Athletics) than the top 10.
